Nel was right: this place does open up. You rush across the foggy bridge ahead onto a massive, suspended stone platform, similar to where Averron City is built. Rhett begins to call out to you, but pauses mid-sentence; rather than try to work out details, the rest of the party forms up and picks up step to remain a decent distance behind you.

"There!" You look over your shoulder, and hear the familiar sound of gunfire as Vision fires a bolt into the fog. "Above!"

"No, two! Or, three!" Nel shouts, and you see him make a rolling dive to one side. "Here, watch me!"

"Careful! Wait for them, and just don't get hit!"

There's rumbling from beneath your feet, and you see the ground start to crack.
